title: Content
name: Content
description:
Defines the MIME type returned by the current page. Optionally, lets you specify the name of a file
  to be returned with the page.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Defines the File/ MIME content type returned by the current page.

attributes.name: deleteFile
attributes.description:
Yes or No. Yes deletes the file after the download operation. Defaults to No.
	This attribute applies only if you specify a file with the file attribute.

attributes.name: range
attributes.description: Yes or No. Yes allows download ranges, no forbids download range, default let it open for client.

attributes.name: file
attributes.description: The name of the file being retrieved

attributes.name: content
attributes.description: this attribute is deprecated, use variable instead

attributes.name: variable
attributes.description: the variable name to the content to output as binary

attributes.name: reset
attributes.description:
Yes or No. Yes discards output that precedes the call to cfcontent. No preserves the output that precedes the call. Defaults to Yes. The reset
		and file attributes are mutually exclusive. If you specify a file, the reset attribute has no effect.
